body_html:
Everything but libcuda.so is in /usr/local/cuda/lib64

libcuda.so is I can find a few:

/usr/local/cuda-8.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs/libcuda.so
/usr/lib/i386-linux-gnu/libcuda.so
/usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcuda.so

Looking for installed cuda packages I see:

cookie@ceres:~$ apt list --installed | grep cuda

WARNING: apt does not have a stable CLI interface. Use with caution in scripts.

cuda/unknown,now 8.0.61-1 amd64 [installed]

body:
Everything _but_ libcuda.so is in /usr/local/cuda/lib64

libcuda.so is I can find a few:

> /usr/local/cuda-8.0/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs/libcuda.so
> /usr/lib/i386-linux-gnu/libcuda.so
> /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libcuda.so


Looking for installed cuda packages I see:

> cookie@ceres:~$ apt list --installed | grep cuda
> 
> WARNING: apt does not have a stable CLI interface. Use with caution in scripts.
> 
> cuda/unknown,now 8.0.61-1 amd64 [installed]
